actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

official_title: To amend the Energy Policy and Conservation Act with respect to the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.

summary.text: Amends the Energy Policy and Conservation Act to require the Secretary of Energy, as part of the Strategic Petroleum Reserve Plan, to establish Regional Petroleum Reserves maintaining oil in sufficient quantities to provide substantial protection against imported oil disruptions in States which consume specified amounts of imported oil. Prohibits the establishment of more than one such Reserve per region.

titles.title: To amend the Energy Policy and Conservation Act with respect to the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.
